kpis.atm-iv: Annualized IV for near-the-money options; DVOL(30D) used as proxy.
kpis.ivr: Percentile of IV over a 52-week window; high = rich implied vol.
kpis.term-structure: Shape/slope of IV across expiries (contango/backwardation and steepness).
kpis.skew-25d-rr: 25Δ call IV minus 25Δ put IV; positive = call-heavy skew.
kpis.vol-of-vol: Volatility of implied vol itself; gauges instability of IV levels.
kpis.ts-kink: 0DTE IV minus mean(1–3DTE) IV; same-day premium signal.
kpis.rv: Historical (realized) volatility over the selected window, annualized.
kpis.iv-rv-spread: IV minus RV; positive suggests an implied volatility risk premium.
kpis.em-hit-rate: Share of periods where spot stayed within the expected-move band.
kpis.rv-em-factor: RV divided by expected-move-implied volatility; >1 = EM underpriced.
kpis.short-horizon-atr: Short-horizon realized σ / intraday ATR normalized vs expected move.
kpis.em-ribbon: Recent expected-move bands vs closes; quick read of over/under moves.
kpis.vix-vvix: Equity vol (VIX) and vol-of-vol (VVIX) regime and jump risk.
kpis.cross-asset-vol: Rates (MOVE), FX, and credit vol benchmarks for cross-asset stress.
kpis.implied-corr: Correlation implied by index vs constituents; crowding/systemic risk.
kpis.macro-events: Upcoming catalysts (FOMC, CPI, NFP, etc.) that reprice vol.
kpis.event-collapse: Post-event IV decay; how quickly premium normalizes after catalysts.
kpis.funding: Perp funding rate; positive = longs pay shorts (carry direction).
kpis.basis: Spot–perp/futures basis; carry opportunity and pressure indicator.
kpis.oi-concentration: Open interest clustered near strikes; indicator of pin risk.
kpis.gammaWalls: Large dealer gamma levels that can magnetize or repel price.
kpis.liquidity-stress: Spreads/depth slippage signals; execution risk under stress.
kpis.condor-credit-em: Net condor credit as % of expected-move width.
kpis.maxloss-credit: Max loss divided by expected credit; entry risk-reward ratio.
kpis.delta-gamma-near-shorts: Delta/Gamma exposure near short strikes; shock sensitivity.
kpis.portfolio-vega-theta: Aggregate vega and theta across positions; carry vs convexity.
kpis.pnl-vs-premium: Realized PnL relative to total premium collected.
kpis.reversion-half-life: Half-life for parity/Δ deviations to mean-revert.
kpis.edge-z: Standardized edge versus historical; z-score of opportunity quality.
kpis.box-financing-spread: Implied financing (box) minus cost of capital; lending carry.
kpis.ex-div-early-ex: Assignment risk from dividends/carry around ex-dates.
kpis.fill-ratio: Filled quantity vs submitted; route/quote quality.
kpis.maker-taker: Maker/taker fee mix and realized rebates.
kpis.legging-risk: PnL impact from legging vs package execution.
kpis.time-to-fill: End-to-end time to fill and number of reprices.
kpis.breakage: Failed/cancelled orders leading to opportunity loss.
kpis.fees-spread: All-in fees plus realized spread paid.
kpis.locked-vs-realized: Captured edge at fill vs ultimately realized edge.
kpis.stress-tests: Portfolio PnL under spot shocks and liquidity haircuts.
kpis.capital-utilization: Margin usage footprint vs limits (Reg-T / PM).
kpis.concentration-limits: Exposure by underlying/tenor vs concentration caps.
kpis.utilization-vs-caps: Daily/expiry risk utilization vs defined caps.
kpis.data-freshness: Book/update staleness; data freshness for decisions.
kpis.uptime: Automation uptime and safety/kill-switch trigger counts.
